title: Prime Factors
statement:
# Prime Factorization

Find all prime factors of a number.

## Problem Description

Given a positive integer N > 1, print all its prime factors in ascending order.

## Input Format

A single positive integer N.

## Output Format

Space-separated prime factors in ascending order (with repetition).

## Constraints

- 2 ≤ N ≤ 10^9
